subNodes.conversationText: You can change the order of your party here by having two characters switch positions. Generally, the further behind a position is, the more protected the character will start a battle (e.g. position 6 is the safest). Please note that surprise attacks or special battle situations might lead to exposing your most protected characters nonetheless.
Switch position of <player6> in slot 6 with...
Switch position of <player5> in slot 5 with...
Switch position of <player4> in slot 4 with...
Switch position of <player3> in slot 3 with...
Switch position of <player2> in slot 2 with...
Switch position of <player1> in slot 1 with...
